original_title: To Woody Allen from Europe with Love
overview: Initiated by producer-director Pierre Drouot, Woody Allen for the very first time agrees to let a filmmaker, Belgium's Andr√© Delvaux, film him during one of his own productions, Stardust Memories. Woody talks about his work, always steering clear of the anecdotal or the private.
title: To Woody Allen from Europe with Love
